name: Let's Play with Nanai!
description: Let's Play With Nanai! is an adult VR sex simulation game designed for Oculus Rift/HTC Vive. It's auto-responding movement is one of the most unique feature of this VR experience.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7, 8, 10 处理器: Corei5-4590 and above 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GTX970 or AMD R9 290 存储空间: 需要 560 MB 可用空间 附注事项: Oculus Rift or HTC Vive.  If using real-time object synching mode, needs Oculus or Vive controller, or phone that supports gyro censor.
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 7, 8, 10 处理器: Corei5-4590 and above 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GTX970 or AMD R9 290 存储空间: 需要 560 MB 可用空间 附注事项: Oculus Rift or HTC Vive.  If using real-time object synching mode, needs Oculus or Vive controller, or phone that supports gyro censor.
